scripts.test: npm run test:ableron-java && npm run test:ableron-js && npm run test:ableron-express && npm run test:ableron-fastify && npm run test:ableron-spring-boot-2 && npm run test:ableron-spring-boot-3
scripts.test:ableron-js: cd ableron-js && npm ci && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test:ableron-express: mkdir -p ableron-express-temp && cp -r ableron-express/. ableron-express-temp && cd ableron-js && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ableron-express-temp && npm install ../ableron-js && npm install && npm run build && npm test && cd .. && rm -rf ableron-express-temp
scripts.test:ableron-fastify: mkdir -p ableron-fastify-temp && cp -r ableron-fastify/. ableron-fastify-temp && cd ableron-js && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ableron-fastify-temp && npm install ../ableron-js && npm install && npm run build && npm test && cd .. && rm -rf ableron-fastify-temp
scripts.test:ableron-spring-boot-2: cd ableron-java && ./mvnw clean install && cd ../ableron-spring-boot-2 && ./mvnw clean install
scripts.test:ableron-spring-boot-3: cd ableron-java && ./mvnw clean install && cd ../ableron-spring-boot-3 && ./mvnw clean install
